Cleaning for CoVID Information

















Helpful CoVID Information 
for Your Vacation & Short-Term Rentals
We are your resource for Short Term Rental information on CoVID. Click Below to Download FREE Resources & Stay Safe!
IMPORTANT: Legally, HIPAA Laws prevent you from asking for any type of Health information from your guests. Even employers cannot legally ask for any of your health information. You are supposed to be protected from discrimination this way (Say you are HIV positive). However, people don't seem to care lately and are discriminating against their neighbors and friends now more than ever. Family members only inviting the vaxed to family celebrations (not even contemplating health issues where the EXPERIMENTAL injection would devastate an already compromised immune system). You CANNOT legally ask, no. But don't worry, ignorant, hateful people will always find a way to judge and discriminate. On a positive note for those who think they know what's best for everyone and think they can make health decisions for the world, just as many people who are vaxed as unvaxed can get CoVID. The "breakthrough" cases are rising every day and have been reported to be as many OR MORE than for those unvaccinated.

ai_summarized_context:
**Website Context Summary:**

The website "BNB-Boss" is a resource hub focused on helping individuals start and manage their own short-term rental (BNB) businesses. It offers a variety of content including blogs, courses, and podcasts aimed at educating users about various aspects of running a BNB, such as property listings, self-directed IRAs, and effective cleaning practices, particularly in the context of COVID-19. The site emphasizes profitability and enjoyment in the BNB business, targeting both newcomers and experienced hosts. It also features free resources, affiliate programs, and personal insights from the founder, Michelle, who has extensive experience in real estate investing. The website promotes community engagement through membership options and provides information on relevant services and products for BNB operators.

**Relevant Details:**
- **Organization Name:** BNB-Boss LLC
- **Purpose:** To educate and support individuals in starting and managing BNB businesses.
- **Content Types:** Blogs, podcasts, courses, downloadable resources, and affiliate marketing.
- **Target Audience:** New and experienced BNB hosts, real estate investors.
- **Key Themes:** Profitability, enjoyment in business, self-directed retirement plans, COVID-19 safety measures, and community support.

This context will help in generating role-aware and context-aware alt texts for images associated with the website.
